alert.note: Alert for Pope; Swift (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 25 at 10:20PM CDT until July 26 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR POPE AND EASTERN SWIFT COUNTIES... At 1020 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Hassel, or 17 miles southeast of Morris, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 1008 PM the Morris Airport measured 60 mph winds. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Pope and eastern Swift Counties, including the following locations... Glenwood Airport, Monson Lake State Park, Benson Airport, Swift Falls, Grove Lake, De Graff, Lake Minnewaska, Gilchrist, Lake Emily and Clontarf. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
